title: Japanese doctor sues government for refusing to acknowledging covid “vaccine” injuries, deaths
cleaned_text:
The government of Japan is involved in a massive cover-up of data showing that covid "vaccines" are destroying lives. And Dr. Masanori Fukushima is suing to try to make that data publicly known.

A highly esteemed medical doctor and scientist, Dr. Fukushima has officially filed a lawsuit against his government's Health Ministry for suppressing data showing that covid jabs are causing increased fatalities across the country.

"Today, we filed a lawsuit against the Japanese government for cancellation of the administrative action," Dr. Fukushima announced during a press conference.

"This is a historically serious problem that threatens the very existence of the nation of Japan. As a medical doctor and a scientist, I had no choice but to dare to take legal action." (Related: In 2021, Japan halted millions of doses of Moderna's covid "vaccines," the vials of which were found to contain mysterious "black substances.")

Dr. Fukushima's biography states that he is a "Professor Emeritus at Kyoto University and Director and Chairman of Translational Research Informatics Center (TRI)." We also know that he is an oncologist with more than 25 years of experience as a leader in treating cancer and reforming Japan's medical system.

Government of Japan still promoting covid jabs while hiding the truth about their dangers

LifeSiteNews posted a video of Dr. Fukushima's press conference, complete with English translations, that you can watch to learn more.

"Today, it is a matter of fundamental importance for the Japanese government to continuously collect and disclose accurate data," Dr. Fukushima began saying during the press conference. "However, I have witnessed the recent fraud scandal committed by the Health Ministry."

Recognizing that the data being withheld is critical for public health as it helps people to assess and make informed consent concerning whether or not to get jabbed, Dr. Fukushima is hopeful that his lawsuit will lead to a positive outcome for the people of Japan.

"Needless to say, it is absolutely important to disclose real-world data on the efficacy and safety of the vaccination against the COVID-19 virus," he said. "This is because such data is directly linked to people's health care, livelihood, and economy. Therefore, I believe that the Japanese government, that is, the Health Ministry, must disclose the data properly to the public."

Data that Dr. Fukushima has personally obtained, but that is not being reported by the Japanese government, shows that unvaccinated Japanese people are far healthier than their "fully vaccinated" counterparts.

"Take a look at the data for 65-69 and 70-79 age groups," he explained. "Surprisingly, the number of new infections or positive cases per 100,000 people is four times higher for people who have been vaccinated twice, compared to unvaccinated people."

"Also, look at the data provided by the Advisory Board in September 2021. The fatality rate of the unvaccinated people and the fatality rates of the one-dose and two-dose vaccine people were described properly. According to the description in red, vaccination has indeed reduced the fatality rate for those over 65 years of age. However, for all ages, vaccination has demonstrated the opposite effect, causing higher fatality rates. This is a paradoxical phenomenon."

Official government documents show all these same things, Dr. Fukushima went on to reveal, but the general public knows nothing about it because it is being concealed on purpose – even as the Japanese government continues to push covid injections on the populace.

"Based on the data published by the Advisory Board in September 2021, the basis for recommending vaccination for all ages should no longer exist anymore," Dr. Fukushima concluded. "Despite the fact, the Health Ministry has pushed ahead with the vaccination."

Learn more about the dangers and ineffectiveness of covid "vaccines" at ChemicalViolence.com.
